attacks.name: Single-Horn Throw
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Worry Seed
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

ability.name: Power Link
ability.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

ability.name: Forest Breath
ability.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may take a  Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your  Pokémon.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Ragin’ Mad Strike
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

ability.name: Speed Link
ability.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

ability.name: Vigor Link
ability.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon cost 1 less  Energy.

ability.name: Snowy Terrain
ability.effect: During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, do 10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Zone Smash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

ability.name: Resilience Link
ability.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

attacks.name: Flash
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.

attacks.name: Moonblast
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −30 damage.

attacks.name: Unknown
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck.

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

ability.name: CHECK
ability.effect: Once during your turn, you may choose either player. Look at the top card of that player's deck.

attacks.name: Dash
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

ability.name: Speed Link
ability.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Fighting Headbutt
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Rolling Spin
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Rolling Spin attack does +60 damage.

ability.name: Power Link
ability.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Kick Shot
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Linear
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

ability.name: Cunning Link
ability.effect: Once during your turn, if you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, you may do 30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Unknown
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Do 20 damage to this Pokémon instead of the usual amount for this Special Condition.

ability.name: Resilience Link
ability.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

attacks.name: Iron Beam Breaker
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a [M] Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Defensive Unit
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Time Mash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, during your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Crisis Dive
attacks.effect: Discard 2 random Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Brave Bird
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

ability.name: Sky Support
ability.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Basic Pokemon's Retreat Cost is 1 less.

attacks.name: Power Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ultimate Force
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

ability.name: Fabled Luster
ability.effect: This Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

name: Irida
ability:
Heal 40 damage from each of your Pokémon that has any [W] Energy attached.

name: Celestic Town Elder
ability:

ability:

ability:
